tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dear Manipal Hospital,

I am writing to provide feedback regarding my recent appointment with Dr. Somnath Mitra on 2 feb, 2023. While I appreciate the opportunity to receive medical care at your facility, I felt compelled to share my concerns about the professionalism and demeanor of Dr. Somnath during my visit.

During the appointment, Dr. Somnath displayed several behaviors that I found concerning. For example, when I attempted to ask questions about my father condition, Dr. Mitra seemed dismissive and rushed, providing minimal explanations and failing to address my concerns adequately. Additionally, there were instances where Dr.Mitra tone came across as condescending, which made me feel uncomfortable and unheard as a patient.
As a result of Dr. Somnath, I left the appointment feeling frustrated and unsure about my treatment plan. This experience has eroded my trust in dr ability to provide compassionate and competent care. Although I have been referred to him by Dr Palankar. Even though I thought of admitting my patient under Dr. Somnath but by seeing his behaviour I can't go forward to get treatment of my father ***** **** ************** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had very very bad experience with Dr. Somnath. I will never recommend this doctor to anyone.. i consulted  him for mild stomach pain. First I waited 1 hour even I has appointment then around 10 mins in his cabin since he was busy in phone. then he has given hardly 2 mins and asked me to do CT scan which cost 13000/-. ** *** *** ****** ** ******* ********* **** ask me to do scan and come. when I asked why need CT Scan *** **** **** then he prescribed two medicine on sos basic and  told do scan after 3 days and come. When I visited after 3 days with CT scan he asked to pay again 700 ruppes for consultation and misbehaved with me. he shouted and told me to get out from my cabin. my CT scan report was totally normal. Then I decided I will not take consultation with this doctor. Again I will request all practo user not to visit this doctor.

review: *** ******* ***** ** ** ********* **** ******* he is genuinely involved with the good health of his patients. i will definitely recommend him to everyone at home and at work. thank you doc somnath!!
** ** *** **** **** *** *** **** ***** Being our family doctor for almost 15 years, his treatment has always satisfied us. We are extremely happy with him.
